attributes.action: Get rid of gorden brown and all his stupid green taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That’s not environmentally friendly, it produces CO2, and you will have to pay tax on it to save the plant. I will spend this tax, not on making things 'greener' but for my jag and holidays! hahahahaha

time to get shot of him. in fact why not the whole lot. MP's are a waste of space and money

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
